svg.text: Uses LRU cache for parsed data
‚Ä¢ Lazy loading: Parse visible/expanded nodes only ‚Üí 500MB+ files stay responsive
‚Ä¢ Dual query modes: memmem substring scan + JSONPath walkers share highlight pipeline
‚Ä¢ Precomputed RowHighlights: LayoutJob paints ranges, no per-frame substring scanning
‚Ä¢ Fragment caps & Arc highlight maps: bounded allocations reused across UI
